3d

Researchers have developed a deep learning system called BioEmu that rapidly generates diverse protein conformations, enabling fast, accurate insights into protein flexibility and function.

Learn more this week in Science: [https://scim.ag/3Hz8rkB](https://scim.ag/3Hz8rkB?trk=public_post_reshare-text)
